body: I was debugging this by running bash in the container (`docker run --user root -it pr342 bash`), and poking around. There aren't many tools available. I used `cat` to look at files most of the time. The `.eslintrc. file has the expected config. I'm not sure what else to look at. Other useful things may be`docker cp`, which can let you copy files in or out. You can also`apt-get install` any packages you need to debug in the container.
